What steps will reproduce the problem?

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
n/a

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
latest

Do you have an error log of what happened?
yes

Edited Sep 20, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user Morwo

Something seems wrong with this to me:

Quote from Cybeloras:

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)

Quote from Morwo:

latest

Normally I would let it slide, but you aren't using the latest version. You are using v6.0.3 - the latest is 6.0.4 r622.

Regardless, TellMeWhen is not causing these errors. They are just the result of Blizzard's broken taint catcher picking a random addon to blame. You should notice that nothing is actually broken in your UI.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
